subject: NCAA Lacrosse Championships
Lacrosse
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Maryland beat Duke and will face top-seeded Loyola, which knocked out Notre Dame, for the N.C.A.A. lacrosse championship on Monday.
snippet: Maryland beat Duke and will face top-seeded Loyola, which knocked out Notre Dame, for the N.C.A.A. lacrosse championship on Monday.
